column1: full and straight, some swing into Parthiv but he drives it fluently. Straight back to Chahar though
some shape again, coming into him, but a touch too full and he flicks, but straight to midwicket
angling across, moving away from him this time, Parthiv has a flash at it, misses
yorker length, the new ball is certainly swinging. Parthiv digs it out to mid-on for a single
full outside off, shape away from Kohli, who takes a stride out to meet the ball on the full and defend towards point
strays on the pads and a beautiful pick-up shot by Kohli off his pads and into the square leg boundary
fuller outside off, Parthiv looks to smash it through covers, gets an inside edge on to the pads
short of length on middle and leg, goes for the pull but doesn't middle it, hits high on the bat, a single to fine leg
length around off, comes forward and flicks it towards short midwicket
short of length outside off, Kohli goes for the cut but gets beaten as the ball swings away just a little bit
short of length around off, stays on the back foot and plays it towards mid-on with soft hands, a direct hit from Bravo but Kohli was home comfortably
short of length on middle and leg, looks to pull it towards square leg, misses and gets struck on the body
length ball, well wide of off, Kohli has a slash at it but doesn't connect
down the track and wants to go inside out but gets a thick outside edge that flies over the slip and into the boundary

got him! Chahar has been testing him outside off and he gets him. In the channel, some shape away and Kohli is drawn irresistibly into an expansive drive. Gets a healthy edge and Dhoni tumbles to his right to hold on.
keeps it well wide of off and AB is happy to watch it go through
good length on the fourth stump, and AB opens the face but steers it straight to gully
down the track, but doesn't get hold of it, the ball goes to square leg off an under-edge. AB was looking to go straight back over the bowler
length ball on the stumps, swung away to deep square leg along the ground
beaten on the pull. short ball in the channel and AB wanted to pull but the ball goes over the bat at shoulder height
length ball on leg stump and AB unleashes a short-arm pull that goes two bounces into the long-on boundary

down the track again but Shardul shortens his length and bowls into the body. AB manages to manufacture a slap and his schoolmate Faf du Plessis, fumbles at mid-off and lets it through so they get two runs
length ball on the stumps, turned to short fine
beautifully timed short ball on the stumps and Parthiv is on to it in a flash. Rocks back and swivels to pull this. Pinging sound off the bat as the ball travels well over deep square leg
length ball, and Chahar's consistently finding swing. AB was pushed on the back foot and pushed it back. It drops short of Chahar
ooh nice lines and AB is beaten. Very close to off stump, on a length. He wanted to send that over cow corner, but connects only with air
good length and straight, AB defends this watchfully from the crease
hoicked into the crowd Chahar has had the better of him for three balls and AB responds with hoick off a straight length ball over square leg. Stand and deliver
quicker and fuller on the stumps, patted back to the bowler
bouncer, but too short and too high over AB. wide
back of a length on off, he wants to slap it away but gets an under-edge to mid-off. They take a quick single
good length outside off, punched crisply to extra cover

Faf got his fingertips to that one, leaping high at mid-off short ball outside off and AB goes hard at it with a horizontal bat. Doesn't time it well, doesn't get elevation. Faf was at mid-off and jumped but could only get a finger tip
and the half-chance is followed by a lovely pick-up shot by Parthiv, who uses his wrists and flicks it over fine leg for maximum
short ball down leg, he's missed out there. Ends up under-edging to short fine leg, but should have got a boundary to that
too full on the pads and it's easy-peasy for AB to put those away. Effortless flick of the wrists to send it racing to deep midwicket
now he gives himself room and lofts this straight over the bowler and once bounce into the boundary. Started tentatively, but AB is finding his groove
good length outside off turning into him, patted towards mid-on
lifted him over deep midwicket. tossed up a bit and Parthiv goes down on one knee and slog-sweeps effectively. Not timed to perfection, but well enough to get the best result
flatter outside off, he moves across and drills it to long-on
a bit too short and outside off, turning away, slashed to deep point, where the man from the cover boundary runs around to collect

Faf catches it at the long-off boundary. Right at the edge of the boundary too! AB was coming down the track and Jadeja shortened his length a bit and possibly gave it a rip. It spins away from AB, who gets a toe-end while trying to go over the top. Faf stays still at the boundary and catches it over his head. Didn't move his feet and it's safe
shorter and quicker, swatted to midwicket off an under-edge
starts off with one on the pads and is flicked nicely to deep square leg, who collects on the bounce
good length outside off, leans into the push. Watson at cover tumbles to his left but can't stop it.
back of a length outside off, punched to deep cover
full toss, uses his wrists to flick it off his pads to deep square
exquisite. Full ball outside off and he leans into a gorgeous cover drive. Not much of a follow through but the timing is so good it races all the way to the boundary
full on the stumps, blocked into the legside and they take a quick single
given some air outside off and Nath drives fluently again, but more softly this time. So only a single
spinning into him from outside off, he goes deep in his crease and turns it to the onside
fuller on off, driven to cover
goes for the sweep again and connects but there is a deep square leg
flatter on off, driven to extra cover
slowed it up a touch and Nath waits for it and pushes it between the fielders on the offside to pick up a single
flattish on off, driven down to long-off
googly, pitches outside off and turning further away. He stays low and cuts it to deep point
flatter on off, pushed toards mid-on
top-spinner on the stumps, he plays down the wrong line and gets a thick outside edge to point
stays back and slaps this past mid-off
tossed up outside off, he wanted to sweep it, but it dipped on him and he doesn't connect. Hits his pad and lobs towards gully
flat, on a length outside off, punched off the back foot past cover
flatter and shorter, he stays in his crease and slaps it to deep cover
what a shot down the track and Jadeja shortens his length, but he essays a short-arm hoick, connects so well that it carries all the way over long-on
goes a bit wider and fires it into the stumps, he pushes it into the offside
stays back to this and late cuts it to short third man
flatter and quicker, fired in on leg stump, he pushes it into the offside again and gets a quick single
fuller on the stumps, goes for the reverse sweep but too full for that. Only a single to short third man
length ball on the stumps, flatter and quicker, Parthiv goes for the pull, gets an inside edge towards short fine leg
tossed up slightly outside off and Parthiv slog sweeps it over deep midwicket, all the way for a six
fuller outside off, driven towards extra cover for a single
slower through the air, Nath comes down the track but Tahir shortens his length, the batsman takes it on the pads in the end
shorter but bowled at 100 kph, drags it via a pull towards midwicket
fuller around off, looks to go over extra cover but mistimes it towards wide long-off, only a single
length outside off, drags it towards deep midwicket, Rayudu sprints towards his right and hits the stumps direct at the bowler's end but Nath was in
length outside off, Parthiv goes for the pull but extra bounce means he can manage it only behind square for one
a touch fuller outside off, comes down the track and looks to clear long-off, stays inside the line of the ball but cannot middle it, du Plessis comes in a few steps and takes it tumbling forward
flatter outside off, Parthiv stays back and steers it towards short third man
length ball outside off, stays back and punches it towards cover
a slower one, fuller on the stumps, Parthiv flicks it towards square leg for a single
length ball on the stumps, stays behind the line and plays it down the wicket with straight bat and gentle hands
length around off, comes forward and taps it softly towards extra cover
length ball on the pads, moves towards the off side and flicks it off his hips for a couple of runs behind square leg, Parthiv had to sprint in the end to make it
slower one outside off, looks to hit it through extra cover but ends up playing it uppishly, well short of Raina though
a full toss outside off from around the wicket, Parthiv makes full use of it and hits it over extra cover for four. Still only eight from the over
length ball on the stumps, looked like a straighter one, pushed back
fuller around off, struck nicely but straight towards long-off
fuller again, on the stumps, bowled at 97 kph though. Parthiv goes back but gets his bat down in time, pushed towards long-on
short of length outside off, stays back and cuts it towards deep point, Jadeja keeps it to one
short and on the leg side, Parthiv moves towards the off side and pulls it behind square, once again only a single though
flatter but a rank short one this time, Stoinis stands in his crease and pulls it over deep midwicket for a maximum

fuller outside off, and Parthiv has just smashed it back towards Stoinis, who reacts quickly get his hand in front of his right shoulder. The ball ricochets towards extra cover and the batsmen complete a single. Stoinis is hurt though and the physio is tending to him
length around off, stays in his crease and pushes it towards extra cover
slower one outside off from around the wicket, fuller in the length. Parthiv moves across and pulls it wide of long-on for four, gets to his fifty, his second off the season
short of length outside off, Parthiv looks to go over extra cover, flat-bats it but mistimes and hence cannot clear Watson at extra cover, who pedals back a bit and takes it comfortably
a slower dipping yorker on the stumps, Moeen was beaten initially but gets his bat down in the end to keep it out
length ball on the stumps, looks to work it on the leg side but not enough room, ends up tapping it down instead
fuller on the stumps, stands tall and smashes it past the non-striker, a sliding stop by long-on keeps it to two
length outside off, not sure what Stoinis was looking for, leaves it alone in the end

fuller outside off, spinning away from the batsman was he looks to go over long-off but fails to middle. Du Plessis at long-off takes the catch but realises momentum is taking him over the boundary line and therefore throws it towards substitute Shorey who is right next to him waiting for it and completes the catch. The umpires are checking upstairs, the soft signal is out and that's a clean catch
fuller on the pads, bowled at 98.7 kph, Moeen glances it fine, past short fine leg for four
length ball on the middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
tossed up outside off, comes forward and flicks it towards wide long-on
length ball on middle and leg, tapped down the wicket for a quick single
short of length around off and middle, Moeen transfers his weight back and pulls it over short midwicket for four
short again, on middle and leg this time, swivels to pull it behind square, only a single
length outside off, looks to dab it to third man, misses
short of length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
a slower length ball gone wrong, way outside off, Moeen lets it go
short of length on the pads, another slower ball, Moeen tucks it towards short fine leg
slower length ball outside off from around the wicket, Moeen was too early in to the pull, fails to connect
lands safely. Another slower bouncer, Moeen goes for the pull but doesn't time it well, but luckily for him, it lands well short of a charging in Jadeja from deep midwicket
almost a yorker on the off stump but Moeen just opens the face of the bat to steer it past Bravo at short third man
slower length ball, goes for the pull but misses and gets hit on the side, will get a leg-bye though
slower length ball outside off, drags it towards deep midwicket, comes back for the second
short of length outside off, looks to cut it away but ends up edging it towards backward point where Rayudu takes an easy catch
a slower one around off, Moeen swings it over the bowler's head, doesn't get the power behind it
fuller outside off and Moeen has just carved it over point for four more, crucial runs these for RCB

fuller and wider outside off, Moeen looks to smash it through the off side, misses. Dhoni is appealing for a caught-behind but not out, the umpire says. Dhoni wants to review this though. Replays confirm there was clear daylight between the bat and the ball
another attempted yorker outside off, Moeen opens the face of the bat to run it past short third man for another boundary in that region
length outside off, slower one at 105 kph, Moeen clears his front leg and looks to go over long-off but doesn't time it well and an easy catch for Thakur at long-off
a low full toss on middle and leg, Umesh hits it towards deep midwicket for one
some shape away from Watson, very full, he pats it to mid-on and they run through for a quick single
some shape away again, but too full and du Plessis plays a pleasing cover drive, but can't go past the fielder
good length on off, ball's swinging away late. But Faf stays still and steers it to third man
too short and Watson is quickly on to that. Rocks back and pulls powerfully for four to square leg

got him! Steyn strikes in his first over again, and this time Stoinis holds on at slip. He had dropped Lynn against KKR in Steyn's comeback match. In the corridor and with the late swing, Watson is tempted into the expansive cover drive, but can only edge it. The ball's travelling but Stoinis does well to hold it with both hands above his head.

full, fast and bye bye Raina Make that four wickets in the Powerplay for Steyn. This is an inch-perfect yorker at 144 kph. Raina's bat is coming down an eon after the ball's got there and his stumps lie shattered. Steyn is pumped - and what a sight that is.
full outside off, and driven to cover
pushed into the offside
nipping into him off a length, pacy one at 146 kph. Pushed past the bowler for a single
back of a length on the fifth stump channel, and he's happy to let it go through
almighty swing and a big miss. Back of length and moving in a touch again, that was an ill-advised shot from Rayudu, wanted to loft over the bowler's head. but difficult to do at 150 kph
full and wide outside off, Rayudu has another thrash at it and misses. Out of his reach
length ball outside off and nicely steered square by Faf. Third man runs to his right to slide and save
shape away from Rayudu, on a length outside off. He stays beside the ball and guides to third man
gets this to swing in to him now, and it's jabbed to mid-on
risky single an all-South African affair. Full outside off, driven to AB at mid-off and Faf takes on his schoolmate. If he had hit, Faf would have been out.
strays on the pads and Rayudu is a bit late on it, turns it to short fine. No wonder he was late on it, that's 148kph!

oh my that's a high full toss, but not a no-ball Caught Faf by total surprise. Pacy ball but comes full and is just about waist high. He reacts hurriedly by taking his top hand off the handle and squirting it to third man
full but down leg and that'll be a wide
back of a length outside off, he was giving himself some room to flay it to the offside, but misses

oh my word how has that missed Shaping away from him and in fact it shaved the stump. At 141 kph, but the bails stay nailed on. Faf's lucky day. He was square up and missed it, should have been bowled, but he's still there. Umesh has a wry smile
full on off, driven to mid-off
full on the stumps and clipped to midwicket off the toe end
that's a poor ball, strays on the pads, nicks them and goes fine for four leg-byes

Akshdeep runs into AB, but AB still holds on to the skier Faf tried to pull that, but it wasn't short enough to swat across the line and he just gets a top edge. It goes steepling high, AB runs in and has settled under it at a short mid-on position and catches it. Akshdeep is running in from midwicket and collides with AB, who merely jogs off with the ball in hand as if he didn't feel a thing.
full and fast outside off, Jadhav is happy to let it go through
down legside and Parthiv is going up in appeal. Think it flicked pad perhaps. But Kohli has gone for a review. And yes, it flicked the pad. No bat involved there. So RCB will lose a review.
yorker, dug out to midwicket. 144.5 kph
good length on a fifth stump line, nicely out to the pitch of the ball to steer to third man
shaping away from him again, back of a length outside off. And he shoulders arms
oh that's unfortunate for the bowler. Good length and rears up a bit, he's left jabbing at it late, it takes the glove and goes for an inside-edged four to fine leg
goes across to play this into the legside
good length outside off, pushed to point off an open face
and there's the bounce Umesh can extract. Rears up off a length and Jadhav is forced to get on his toes and pat it down from above waist height
great shot. Umesh errs in line, on the pads and too full, Jadhav flicks it off his pads with minimal follow through, powers it to the midwicket fence

dolly to de Villiers good length outside off and Jadhav went for a cross-batted heave. Didn't have the room to play it, wasn't the right length either. Gets a top edge that loops to AB at mid-off for an easy catch.

slashed past point and into the boundary. Full outside off and Dhoni perhaps instinctively went low to cut it. Gets it more aerial than he would have liked, given CSK's situation, but well wide of point
full and straight, almost yorker length, homing into him, turned off his toes to midwicket
full outside off, punched to mid-off. AB's lurking there so they don't even consider the single
skilfully played short outside off and Rayudu ramps this over slip and into the boundary. Stayed very still and watched the ball onto the bat all the way
good length on the pads, and turned to square leg
good length, coming into him, Dhoni gets behind it and pushes it towards mid-on, takes one hand off the bat

that's a loud shout RCB have reviews left. This looked close, length ball coming in, rapped him on the pads. Not given. And in the excitement no one's backing up behind the stumps so they get overthrows
angling into him on a length, he goes back and punches this to the bowler's right
down the track and gets to the pitch of the ball to pat it back. Negi fields and Rayudu has to scramble back to his crease at the non-striker's end
smart batting Fired this down leg, poor ball and Dhoni waits and paddles it fine, very fine. No chance for any fielder
was coming down the track again, but is quick to get his back foot back in the crease, beaten by turn and bounce outside off
too much width outside off and turning away, Dhoni stays in his crease, transfers weight back and slaps it past cover
strays on the pads again and punched to deep midwicket
back of a length and he was coming down the track, pats it towards cover. Kohli runs past the ball while rushing in and allows the single

Kohli misses a run out chance some uncertain running there. Dhoni had inside edged onto pad and it dropped near him. They set off for a run after hesitating. Kohli is sprinting in and under-arms to the stumps but misses. Rayudu stays
steered to third man
back of a length, stump to stump, Dhoni pats it back to the bowler off the back foot
whiplash pull. Too short and he's quickly on the back foot and send this crashing to the square leg boundary
good length on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
length ball on off, turning away, cut to deep point
good length on middle, Dhoni goes back in his crease and pulls, but can't go past midwicket
length ball on off, chopped past point
googly, hurried on to him, he gets his bat down and jabs it to the bowler's left
drifts on the pads and is clipped to long-on off the front foot
misfield by AB at mid-off, slips on the field. Dew is telling. length ball that Dhoni had pushed
length outside off, stays back and punches it towards cover
length ball around off, stays back and pushed it towards the bowler
down the track to this length ball outside off, and goes over extra cover, didn't exactly middle it but it still sails all the way for a six
fuller on the stumps, flicks it in front of square for one
length around off, moves across and flicks it towards midwicket
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and pushes it towards long-on
short of length around middle, Dhoni goes back and pulls it towards long-on
short of length again, looked like a googly, Rayudu pulls it towards deep square leg
fuller this time, around leg stump, Dhoni lunges forward and pushes it towards long-on

beauty! Length ball, drifting on middle and leg, and spinning past the batsman to beat the outside edge. Parthiv is quick to take the bails off and they are going upstairs. Rayudu lifted his back foot but did it come down in time? It's touch and go. Numerous replays, and it looks Rayudu might not have got his foot down in time. But third umpire thinks otherwise and Rayudu survives
length ball around middle and off, pushed it towards covers
tossed up on leg stump, Rayudu comes forward and works it towards the right of long-on
short of length on the stumps, Rayudu charges down and looks to pull, misses
short again, just around off stump, Rayudu heaves it over wide long-on, clearing the boundary line for a six
short of length outside off, stays back and steers it behind point for one
length ball on the stumps, tucked away towards midwicket, 50 of the stand comes up with that single
short of length outside off, Rayudu has decided to go after the bowling now, comes down the track, gives himself some room and smashes it over mid-off
an offcutter this time, on a length outside off, opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man
fuller on the leg stump, Rayudu comes forward and looks to flick it towards midwicket, misses and the ball ricochets off the pads to clatter into the off stump
short of length outside off, goes back and punches it towards long-off
tossed up on middle and leg, comes forward and pushes it towards long-on
fuller and flatter this time, around off, turns it towards short midwicket
fuller around off once again, Jadeja comes forward and pushes it towards cover
fuller outside off, clears his front leg and hits it firmly towards long-on
length ball but way down the leg side, left alone
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes, an inside edge rolls towards short fine leg
fuller outside off, Dhoni stays in the crease and steers it towards deep point for an easy two
fuller around off, hits it hard but straight to Kohli at extra cover
length ball on the stumps, comes in after landing to cut the batsman in half as he pushes at it
length ball on middle and leg, Dhoni looks to flick but misses, but still scampers through for a leg-bye, Stoinis looks to kick the ball on to the stumps but misses. Think Jadeja was in anyway
length ball around off, stays back and dabs it towards point for one
short of length outside off, goes back and hits it towards long-off
length ball on middle and leg, forced towards midwicket off the back foot
tossed up outside off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover, Negi fumbles there and that allows the second run
fuller outside off, Jadeja looks to smash it on the leg side but mistimes it towards long-on
length ball on the pads, comes forward plays it gently towards midwicket, the fielder is at the boundary, four RCB fielders converging towards the ball but cannot stop the second run
tossed up on the stump, comes forward and launches it over the bowler's head for a six
starts with a dot ball, length ball on middle and leg, Jadeja can only tuck it towards Kohli at short midwicket
short of length once again, Jadeja goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket, Negi once again fumbles but recovers just in time to keep it to two
fuller this time, just outside off, Jadeja clears his front leg and looks to smash, cannot beat mid-off

short of length outside off, Dhoni goes for the pull but mistimes it towards short midwicket, Dhoni sets off, Jadeja commits before Dhoni decides against it, Saini is quick to the ball and does the wise thing by running up to the stumps and dislodging the bails to find Jadeja stranded mid-pitch
short of length outside off, Dhoni throws his hands at it, gets a thick outside edge that runs between the keeper and short third man
short of length outside off, Dhoni comes down the track and hits it towards long-off, doesn't time it well
length ball around off, Dhoni pushes it towards deep extra cover for one
length around off, Bravo stays back and punches it towards deep extra cover for a couple
length again, on the pads this time, Bravo misses out and can flick it only towards short fine leg
length outside off, Dhoni stands in his crease and smashes it over long-on with all the nonchalance in this world. Was an offcutter from Steyn. Gets to his fifty as well

another slower one, length ball on the stumps, turns it towards midwicket with his wrists, Steyn sprints to stop the second run, Dhoni also sort of slips while turning around and sends his partner back
length again, on the hips, Bravo flicks it uppishly towards the right of deep midwicket, this time they get the second run
short of length outside off, cuts it hard towards sweeper cover, only a single available there and Dhoni denies it
short of length outside off, looks to pull it over wide long-on, doesn't time it and the ball rolls towards long-on. Refuses the single again
short of length outside off, and Dhoni uppercuts it over short third man and it sails all the way. And also, Saini has overstepped here. A free-hit coming up but moreover, an extra ball

length ball on the stumps, Dhoni looks to go over the bowler's head but doesn't middle it, Kohli from long-on cuts it off and throws it towards the keeper's end. Dhoni makes it by the time the ball reaches Parthiv, Bravo on the other hand was struggling though
length ball outside off, smashes it towards long-off, but doesn't take the single
length outside off, once again Dhoni can hit it only towards Steyn at long-off, takes the single this time
length outside off, Bravo looks to pull it away but gets an outside edge that flies towards Parthiv who leaps off and takes it with both hands
short of length outside off, Dhoni manages to pull it towards deep square leg, Negi from deep midwicket cannot reach there in time
that has gone out of the stadium. Another short of length outside off and Dhoni just smashes it into the outer space

fuller around off and Dhoni has gone over long-off there. But wait, AB jumps in the air, you cannot time your jump better, gets his right hand to it but cannot latch on and it goes over the boundary line
a low full toss on the stumps, Dhoni hits it towards deep square leg and sprints back for the second
another six. A full toss on the stumps and Dhoni has pulled it between deep square leg and deep midwicket. Dhoni is pulling it off here. Nothing is beyond this man

Dhoni looks to steer it behind point and misses but they go for the bye. Shardul sprints towards the other end, Parthiv Patel hits the stumps direct, Shardul dives but cannot make it. Coming to the ball, it was a length ball outside off, looked like an offcutter, and bounced once more before reaching Parthiv, who was waiting for it with his right glove off
